ComicInfo.Summary: During a confrontation with Japanese and American gangster spirits, Peter Venkman's soul is dislodged, and a ghost named Fred takes over his body. At their base, the Ghostbusters grapple with Venkman's lifeless form, fearing his soul is lost in a desolate void. Fred reports to ghostly mob bosses, including Al Capone, who decide to eliminate the Ghostbusters. As the team theorizes Venkman's soul is in Purgatory, they're ambushed by malevolent spirits, leading to a tragic confrontation in the streets.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:04:10. [CVDB140462] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 09:46:38. [Issue ID 545491]
ComicInfo.Characters: Al Capone,Peter Venkman,Winston Zeddemore,Meyer Lansky,Egon Spengler,Ray Stantz,Bugsy Siegel,Lucky Luciano
